latestInspection.result: Inspection Result:     Compliance Inspection of Open Violations - Reinspection Not Required

infractions.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to provide constant and competent supervision for children within its care
infractions.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection hallways and other means of egress were observed obstructed and impassable
infractions.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

infractions.Violation Summary: Designated outdoor play area was observed without fencing of appropriate height at time of inspection
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: Outdoor play area was observed not maintained nor free of hazards or nuisances at time of inspection
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was determined that child care service failed to conduct and document monthly fire drills
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection floors/walls ceilings were observed not maintained in disrepair or covered in a toxic finish
Adequate lighting not provided in food prep area at time of inspection Foods observed not protected from contamination from light fixture/bulb damage at time of inspection
